title: Trends in Modern Mathematics Textbook Research and Application of Problem-Posing Teaching Methods (Self-Directed)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical theories and educational principles
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in analyzing mathematics textbooks and developing problems via real-classroom simulations in VR environments

learning_goals: Analyze trends in mathematics textbook research to explain the latest educational trends.
Implement learner-engaged lesson designs using problem-posing strategies.
Compare and analyze various textbook cases through VR-based simulation tools and propose improvement plans.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
